entry.data:
SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
